General.Name: EON Resources Inc.
General.Description: EON Resources Inc., an independent oil and natural gas company, focuses on the acquisition, development, exploration, and production of oil and natural gas properties in the Permian Basin. It holds a 100% working interest in the property that consists of 342 producing wells, as well as 207 water injection wells and one water source well covering an area of approximately 13,700 acres. The company was formerly known as HNR Acquisition Corp and changed its name atop EON Resources Inc. in September 2024. EON Resources Inc. was founded in 2017 and is headquartered in Houston, Texas.
General.Address: 3730 Kirby Drive, Houston, TX, United States, 77098
